text: Andrei Vladimirovich Babushkin (; 28 January 1964 â€“ 14 May 2022) was a Russian publicist, politician, sociologist and human rights activist. He was a member of Yabloko. He was on the Presidential Council for Civil Society and Human Rights from 2012 to 2022. He was born in Moscow Oblast, Soviet Union. Babushkin died of pancreatitis in Moscow, Russia on 14 May 2022 at the age of 58. ==Related pages== *List of sociologists from Europe ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Russian human rights activists Category:Politicians from Moscow Category:Businesspeople from Moscow Category:Russian sociologists
title: Andrei Babushkin
